                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String email,
                                                 java.lang.String password,
                                                 java.lang.String confirmPassword)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        user register method, you should call Connection.createPacketCollector(PacketFilter) method.
        Specified by:
        userRegister in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        username - user name should be unique, not null
        name - display name (or nick name)
        email - user's email
        password - password
        confirmPassword - confirm password
        Returns:
        connection Return an XMPP connection if registered successfully, or null if not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw a ServiceException which extends Exception
